mapper.insert: insert into ticket_receipts (id, rid, price, purchase_type, discounted_price, pos_id, customer_id, credit_no, miliege) values (#{id}, #{rid}, #{price}, #{purchaseType}, #{discountedPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pos.id}, #{customer.id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{creditNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{miliege,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
insert into tickets (id, seat_id, movie_timetable_id, ticket_receipt_id, customer_type_id) values (seq_tickets.nextval, #{seat.id}, #{movieTimetable.id}, #{ticketReceipt.id}, #{customerType.id})
insert into discount_ticket (id, ticket_receipt_id, discount_id) values (seq_discount_ticket.nextval, #{ticketReceipt.id}, #{discount.id})
mapper.select: select C.id "movieTimetable.id" ,C.started_at "movieTimetable.statedAt" ,C.ended_at "movieTimetable.endedAt" ,C.ordered "movieTimetable.ordered" ,D.id id ,D.seat_id "seat.id" ,E.name "seat.name" from ticket_receipts B, movie_timetable C, tickets D, seats E where B.id = D.ticket_receipt_id and C.id = D.movie_timetable_id and E.id = D.seat_id and B.deleted = 'N' and C.id = #{value}

select A.id id, A.rid rid, A.price price, A.purchase_type purchaseType, A.discounted_price discountedPrice, A.pos_id pos, A.customer_id "customer.id", A.deleted deleted, A.purchase_date purchaseDate, A.credit_no creditNo, B.username "customer.username", B.password "customer.password", B.name "customer.name", B.phone "customer.phone", B.email "customer.email", B.gender "customer.gender", B.miliege "customer.miliege", B.image_uri "customer.imageUri", B.deleted "customer.deleted", B.third_party "customer.thirdParty", B.created_at "customer.createdAt", B.updated_at "customer.updatedAt", B.customer_rank_id "customer.customerRank.type", B.customer_type_id "customer.customerTypes.type", B.birth "customer.birth"
from TICKET_RECEIPTS A, CUSTOMERS B where A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.ID and A.CREDIT_NO like '%' || #{value} || '%'

select A.id id, A.rid rid, A.price price, A.purchase_type purchaseType, A.discounted_price discountedPrice, A.pos_id pos, A.customer_id "customer.id", A.deleted deleted, A.purchase_date purchaseDate, A.credit_no creditNo, B.username "customer.username", B.password "customer.password", B.name "customer.name", B.phone "customer.phone", B.email "customer.email", B.gender "customer.gender", B.miliege "customer.miliege", B.image_uri "customer.imageUri", B.deleted "customer.deleted", B.third_party "customer.thirdParty", B.created_at "customer.createdAt", B.updated_at "customer.updatedAt", B.customer_rank_id "customer.customerRank.type", B.customer_type_id "customer.customerTypes.type", B.birth "customer.birth"
from TICKET_RECEIPTS A, CUSTOMERS B where A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.ID and A.customer_id = #{value}

select A.id id, A.rid rid, A.price price, A.purchase_type purchaseType, A.discounted_price discountedPrice, A.pos_id "pos.id", A.customer_id "customer.id", A.deleted deleted, A.purchase_date purchaseDate, A.credit_no creditNo, A.printed printed, A.miliege miliege, B.username "customer.username", B.password "customer.password", B.name "customer.name", B.phone "customer.phone", B.email "customer.email", B.gender "customer.gender", B.miliege "customer.miliege", B.image_uri "customer.imageUri", B.deleted "customer.deleted", B.third_party "customer.thirdParty", B.created_at "customer.createdAt", B.updated_at "customer.updatedAt", B.customer_rank_id "customer.customerRank.type", B.customer_type_id "customer.customerTypes.type", B.birth "customer.birth" from TICKET_RECEIPTS A, CUSTOMERS B where A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.ID (+) and A.rid like '%' || #{value} || '%'

select id id, signed_in_at signedIn, signed_out_at signedOut, employee_id "employee.id", pos_id "pos.id" from pos_login_history where pos_id = #{pos.id} and signed_in_at < #{purchaseDate} and (signed_out_at >= #{purchaseDate} or signed_out_at is null)

select A.id id, A.rid rid, A.price price, A.purchase_type purchaseType, A.discounted_price discountedPrice, A.pos_id "pos.id", A.customer_id "customer.id", A.deleted deleted, A.purchase_date purchaseDate, A.credit_no creditNo, B.username "customer.username", B.password "customer.password", B.name "customer.name", B.phone "customer.phone", B.email "customer.email", B.gender "customer.gender", B.miliege "customer.miliege", B.image_uri "customer.imageUri", B.deleted "customer.deleted", B.third_party "customer.thirdParty", B.created_at "customer.createdAt", B.updated_at "customer.updatedAt", B.customer_rank_id "customer.customerRank.type", B.customer_type_id "customer.customerTypes.type", B.birth "customer.birth"
from TICKET_RECEIPTS A, CUSTOMERS B where A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.ID and A.customer_id = #{value}

select A.id "ticketReceipt.id" ,B.id id ,B.movie_timetable_id "movieTimetable.id" ,B.customer_type_id "customerType.id" ,B.seat_id "seat.id" ,C.type "customerType.type" ,C.price "customerType.price" from ticket_receipts A, tickets B, customer_types C where A.id = B.ticket_receipt_id and C.id = B.customer_type_id and A.deleted = 'N' and A.id = #{value}

select A.id "discount.id" ,A.name "discount.name" ,A.detail "discount.detail" ,A.discount_percent "discount.discountPercent" ,A.started_date "discount.startedDate" ,A.end_date "discount.endDate" ,A.discount_type "discount.discountType" ,A.discount_price "discount.discountPrice" ,A.customer_type_id "discount.customerType.id" ,B.id id ,C.type "discount.customerType.type" ,C.price "discount.customerType.price" from discounts A, discount_ticket B, customer_types C where A.id = B.discount_id and C.id = A.customer_type_id and B.ticket_receipt_id = #{value}

select A.id id ,A.used used ,A.received_at receivedAt ,A.expired_at expiredAt ,A.customer_id "customer.id" ,A.coupon_id "coupon.id" ,B.name "coupon.name" from coupon_customers A, coupones B where A.coupon_id = B.id and A.ticket_receipt_id = #{value}
